name: Re:Tris
description:
Re:Tris was made during a four hour game jam at the Warwick Game Design Society in March 2022, around the theme of revolution.

CONTROLS:

  • Left/Right - rotate player
  • X - Pickup/Drop segment

HOW TO PLAY

Segments will spawn at random. Complete a circle of the same colour to clear it. Pick up the fallen segments and drop them in new places. Don't let a stack reach the white circle, or you'll lose!
